featured.text: Franklin was charmed by the music, but felt that there was a better way to create the same sound.
The amazing adventures of Superman, Peter Pan, and Harry Potter have charmed many people, children and adults alike.
Superman, Peter Pan, and Harry Potter have charmed many people, because __________.
Other times, a magician may make you a magic charm, or say a spell, to cure you.

definition.en_def: A quality that makes someone or something attractive or appealing.
definition.example: Her charm won over everyone at the party.
